description: This file defines a multi-agent financial analysis team using classes and functions, including agent setup, memory configuration, and team instructions for financial research and analysis.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Represents a team of agents with shared instructions and tools for financial analysis.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an individual agent with specific roles, tools, and memory.

classes.name: Memory
classes.description: Handles in-memory and database-backed storage for agent data.

classes.name: PostgresMemoryDb
classes.description: PostgreSQL database interface for storing memories.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: Model class for Anthropic's Claude AI.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model class for OpenAI's chat models.

classes.name: PostgresAgentStorage
classes.description: Storage class for agent session data in PostgreSQL.

classes.name: ReasoningTools
classes.description: Tools for reasoning and analysis within the team.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: Tools for retrieving financial data from Yahoo Finance.

methods.name: get_reasoning_finance_team
methods.description: Constructs and returns the 'Reasoning Finance Team' object with configured agents, tools, and instructions.
